title: mas custom
body:
Welcome to Mark-a-Spot!

Your community reporting platform is ready to use. Mark-a-Spot helps citizens and local governments work together to improve neighborhoods and public spaces.

Getting Started

  • Report Issues: See something that needs attention? Use the "Report an Issue" button to notify the right people.
  • Track Progress: Follow reports to see updates as they're addressed.
  • Explore Data: View statistics to understand community needs and see what's being fixed.

For Developers

Looking to customize or extend Mark-a-Spot? Check out our developer documentation for API guides and integration options.

Backend Access

Want to see how the backend looks? Visit localhost/user to access the administration area and explore the full functionality of your installation.

Powered by

The open source civic issue tracking solution
